text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Iesus Jonɨn abuir gumazimningɨn akam ikara, “Gua uamategh mangɨ bizir gua ganigha oraghizibar gun Jonɨn mɨkemegh! ‘Gumazir damazir okavɨrɨziba ua gari, ezɨ gumazir suer amɨrɨziba uam arui. Ezɨ gumazir lepa itiba ua zuegha dera, ezɨ gumazir kuarir orazir puvatɨziba uam orasi. Ezɨ ovengezir gumaziba ua dɨkavima, ezɨ gumazir onganarazibagh amiba akar aghuim barasi.’(7:22) Nɨ Matyu 11:5ɨn itir akamɨn gan.
